medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with acute lower abdominal pain that started last night. Prior to this, she was feeling fairly well and eating normally. She has been constipated but denied any bloody or dark stools. She has experienced some nausea but no vomiting. She has never had a similar episode before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, chronic pruritus, degenerative joint disease of left knee and hip, seasonal allergies, depression
